about_the_game:
Super Bundle for Idle Wasteland.

Contains:
Progression Pack - 2x currency gain forever, +25 max damage, +25 armor penetration, +25k scrap
Transmuter Drone - Drone that transmutes all scrap piles to gold every 45 seconds, giving more xp and scrap
Experience Doubler - Unlock a 25% chance to gain double exp perk + 50 biomagic tubes and 10 rabbit foot's
Bonus - 255 Nuclear Material, 3 Super Skill Points
